channel.title: My Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content on My Personal Website

item.title: About
item.description: <Insert something funny> Welcome to my personal website, I am a PhD student at the ETH Zurich in computational biomechanics, my main project being the modelling and simulation of the musculoskeletal system of the shoulder. Overall, I am interested by numerical methods and modelling approaches in the field of computational solid mechanics, with an emphasis on high-performance computing. My longlast passion gravitates around the interactive simulation of deformable bodies. To summarize it in a bullet list with magic keywords (because who hates bullet list and keywords ?
